review: Clean simple functional and useful. This is a great app, easy to use and my reminders help keep me on track
title: Clean simple functional and useful

review: I’ve been looking a different BP apps for while. This one was talked about online, so I thought I’d give it a try. Bad decision! I’m not even sure if I ever was able to get my BP with this app. There were so many commercial interruptions not to mention every page has a commercial residing on it. I have no problem with commercials but let’s keep them to a reasonable level. There is zero user friendliness and going from page to page feels awkward.
title: Poorly designed

review:
It just keeps wanting me to download one app after another. The last one was an app to clean my device AKA app to infect my device with no telling what so I’ll have to pay someone to scam me. 
Something like this may be available in the future to check blood pressure but not any time in the near future and certainly not this app.
title: You may not want to download

review: Not a bp app, just a series of advertisements. Please remove it from the App Store. This is not what it says it is. There is no blood pressure app in it. Take it off the App Store or explain why they can advertise a blood pressure app that is just a bunch of unrelated ads. All it does is record blood pressure that you record on real device. Watch the video, it’s not true.

review: They give you the impression that you can take your blood pressure with this app. You can’t. It is just riddled with advertisements. Instead, you’re easily pressing the wrong button then sent to endless ads.

review: What a coincidence all the 5 stars reviews were on 21 Sep..! Locks like someone is manipulated the reviews. Why is a scam..! Because the app is not a app. just they pushed you to download an others app free full of advertisement. The app is just made a data base for sell your information

review: It does not read your blood pressure, it only allows you to enter pressure taken from a device. The interface you are presented with is trying to confuse you into purchasing other unrelated apps.

review: It shows you being able to take your pulse, and it would then calculate you BP, all you can do with this app is put the readings you did yourself.  It should also be noted that it is riddled with ads.
